# README

Following [Marees <em>et al</em>'s GWAS tutorial ](https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC6001694/)
With small adaptions to plink v 1.9 and more familiarity with R. Steps are connected into a pipeline using snakemake.
